original_text: Ephraim's people have built many altars to make sin offerings. But the altars have become places where the people do even more sins! 8: The covenant said that there should be only one altar. The people in Israel had built many altars. The altars should have been places where people asked God to forgive them for their sins. But instead, they became places where the people did bad things. Ephraim's people have built many altars to make sin offerings. But the altars have become places where the people do even more sins! 8: The covenant said that there should be only one altar. The people in Israel had built many altars. The altars should have been places where people asked God to forgive them for their sins. But instead, they became places where the people did bad things. Ephraim's people have built many altars to make sin offerings. But the altars have become places where the people do even more sins! 8: The covenant said that there should be only one altar. The people in Israel had built many altars. The altars should have been places where people asked God to forgive them for their sins. But instead, they became places where the people did bad things. Ephraim's people have built many altars to make sin offerings. But the altars have become places where the people do even more sins! 8: The covenant said that there should be only one altar. The people in Israel had built many altars. The altars should have been places where people asked God to forgive them for their sins. But instead, they became places where the people did bad things. Ephraim's people have built many altars to make sin offerings.
korean_text: 에브라임은 죄를 위하여 제단을 많이 만들더니 그 제단이 그에게 범죄하게 하는 것이 되었도다

sentences.original_text: Ephraim's people have built many altars
to make sin offerings
But the altars have become places
where the people do even more sins
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 더 많은 죄를 짓는 곳으로

sentences.original_text: The covenant said that
there should be only one altar
The people in Israel had built many altars
The altars should have been places
where people asked God to forgive them
for their sins
But instead
they became places where the people did bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들이 나쁜 일을 하는 장소가 되었다
